metadata.title: CVE-2023-52593 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: wifi:wfx: fix possible NULL pointer dereference in wfx_set_mfp_ap() Since'ieee80211_beacon_get()' can return NULL, 'wfx_set_mfp_ap()' should checkthe return value before examining skb data. So convert the latter to returnan appropriate error code and propagate it to return from 'wfx_start_ap()'as well. Compile tested only.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
